sure to slip into the back bump slip_stitch into the back bump of the remaining chains all the way back to the single_crochet at the top of the cross sl t into this single_crochet continue in this same manner making single_crochet in the each of the double crochets on the outer edges make 3 single_crochet into each chain 3 space c looped d lu 2025 3 when you reach the bottom of the right arm do not slip_stitch to join make an invisible join as shown in the video leave a 6-8 tail pull the yarn through the last single_crochet before joining with an embroidery or doll needle sew the working yarn under both loops of the middle single_crochet in the starting edge then sew the working yarn back down through the middle of the last single_crochet made where the tail comes from now you can weave your end back to the center of the cross tie it off with the starting tail and bury both ends in the starting round before trimming the ends making the tassel to go into the tassel loop wrap the thread around 4 fingers on your non-dominant hand i use my left hand making sure to wrap with an
